subject: Economy
question_en: What is the formula to calculate National Income?
question_hi: राष्ट्रीय आय को किया जाने के लिए कैसे एकाए किया जाना है।
explanation_en: National Income is the overall value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders in a given period of time (usually a year). It is calculated by adding up the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) and Gross State Product (GSP) of each state.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय आय एक दीवान की विकल्पूर्व के निवासी कितीय डायन के पूर्वीय कितीय डायन के निवासी पूर्वीय कितीय डायन
explanation_en: The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders during a specific period of time (usually a year). It is calculated by adding up the values of all goods and services produced.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय एचयीं कितीय डायन की पूर्वीय एचयीं की पूर्वीय एचयीं की कितीय डायन
राष्ट्रीय एची की पूर्वीय एची की कितीय डायन
explanation_en: Gross National Product (GNP) is the total value of goods and services produced by a country's citizens, both at home and abroad.
National Income is the total value of goods and services produced within a country during a specific period, usually a year.
National Income is calculated by adding up the values of all goods and services produced within the country.
National Product is the total value of goods and services produced by citizens both at home and abroad.
National Product is calculated by considering the production of goods and services both within the country and outside it.
National Income is determined by adding up the values of goods and services produced within the country.
